name: Aquila Favonia
effect: ATK is increased by {0}%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to {1}% of ATK and dealing {2}% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
description: The sword of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evilâ€”just like the last heroine who wielded it.
